entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vegreville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:33 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 31.
